scripts.title: Verify Vocabulary Object and Array Script Time Out
scripts.description: Verify Vocabulary Object and Array Script Time Out
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$array_rrr = $array_implode[0];
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode, 'array_rrr' => $array_rrr ];     
?>
